title: 5 Must have Paid Android App ( Giveaway closed)

description: Here are best-paid android apps  (not games) that everyone should have.   #1 Nova Launcher Prime 0:52    #2 Tasker 3:05   #3 Sync for reddit (Pro) 4:50   #4  Poweramp 6:50   #5 Cerberus anti theft  8:33    [Giveaway FAQ]  Q. How do I participate in a giveaway?  Well, subscribe to my channel, if you haven't already and just let me know you want it. You can do this by leaving a comment in this video. Sharing this video would be nice, but not necessary.    Q. How do I know if I won or not?  I will announce the names of winners on 1 JAN 2016, on my facebook and twitter page. If possible, I will also reply to your (whoever wins) original comment to make sure you get the notification. Facebook:  Twitter:   Q. Is this an international giveaway?  Yes, I will send you 16 digit code via email and once you enter them on cerebrum app, you will get full-time license.
